column4: Amazon stock market value on verge of eclipsing Microsoft
column5: Amazon.com Inc's shares surged on Friday  pushing its stock market value above $700 billion and threatening to eclipse Microsoft Corp  a day after the online retailing behemoth reported blockbuster results.
